subject: Science
title: How Much Water Covers Earth?
description: Learn How Much Water Covers Earth? in one minute.

hook.text: From space, Earth looks blue. That's because 71% of its surface is ocean.

buildup.text: The Pacific Ocean alone is bigger than all the land on Earth combined.

discovery.text: There's one connected ocean, divided by continents into five named regions.

twist.text: If Earth were a basketball, all the water would fit in a marble next to it.

climax.text: 97% of Earth's water is in the oceans. Only 3% is fresh â€” and most of that is ice.

punchline.text: Earth has tons of water. Almost none of it is drinkable.

quiz.question: What percentage of Earth's surface is covered by ocean?
